name: DELAWARE VALLEY APARTMENT HOUSE OWNER'S ASSOCIATION, Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Delaware Valley Apartment House Owner's Ass'n v. Commonwealth

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: DELAWARE VALLEY APARTMENT HOUSE OWNER’S ASSOCIATION, Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The appeal is quashed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: R. Scott Shearer, Robert Patrick Coyne, Deputy Attys. Gen., Harrisburg, Paul S. Roeder, for appellant.
Frank E. Hahn, Jr., Barton A. Hertzbach, Obermayer, Rebmann, Maxwell & Hippel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
413 A.2d 686
DELAWARE VALLEY APARTMENT HOUSE OWNER’S ASSOCIATION, Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 24, 1980.
Decided May 6, 1980.
R. Scott Shearer, Robert Patrick Coyne, Deputy Attys. Gen., Harrisburg, Paul S. Roeder, for appellant.
Frank E. Hahn, Jr., Barton A. Hertzbach, Obermayer, Rebmann, Maxwell & Hippel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
